newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's MEFF trading volume up 53 pct in April.
newsitem.headline: Spain's MEFF trading volume up 53 pct in April.

text.p: The trading volume in financial derivatives at Spain's MEFF Holding financial futures exchange rose in April to 3.12 million contracts, up 53.03 percent versus the year-ago period.
In a statement MEFF said that trading volume in equity futures hit an all-time high in April with 687,313 contracts, up 84 percent from April 1996.
Equity options totalled 178,001 contracts, with a daily average standing at 8,091.

MEFF said financial bond futures showed a 46 percent increase in the number of contracts to a daily average of 110,617 contracts. The 10-year bond future totalled 1.95 million contracts in April, with a daily average of 88,552.
